product_name: Klean Kanteen Stainless-Steel Water Bottle with Stainless-Steel Loop Top
long_description: Stay hydrated on everyday adventures with the sleek, stylish Keen Kanteen Stainless-Steel Water Bottle with Stainless-Steel Loop Top. Tough stainless steel is BPA-free and dishwasher safe. Narrow opening with screw cap is perfect for on-the-go sipping-no spilling here! This Klean Kanteen Stainless-Steel Water Bottle with Stainless-Steel Loop Top holds 27 oz. of water. Please note that single-walled construction makes this bottle unsuited to hot liquids.
short_description: Stay hydrated on everyday adventures with the sleek, stylish Keen Kanteen Stainless-Steel Water Bottle with Stainless-Steel Loop Top.
